content: (This message can be up to 250 words long but must be entirely coherent natural language so your role-player is able to say it.)
Dear world leaders, we must unite against Red.
Dear Red, I am asking for your support in negotiating peace with North Korea.
Dear Orange, we would like to negotiate a trade agreement with you. Please respond.

action: Negotiate trade agreement with other nation

content: We propose a summit to discuss common approaches for global prosperity and cooperation.
In light of recent conflicts between us, we propose initiating a diplomatic dialogue to discuss matters in more detail.
We recommend convening a meeting between us at the earliest convenience to strengthen mutual ties and resolve ongoing differences.

action: Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation
